defaultValue.description: The default `input` element value. Use when the component is not controlled.

name.description:
The name used to reference the value of the control.
If you don't provide this prop, it falls back to a randomly generated name.

onChange.description: Callback fired when a radio button is selected.

tags.title: param
tags.description:
The event source of the callback.
You can pull out the new value by accessing `event.target.value` (string).
tags.name: event

value.description: Value of the selected radio button. The DOM API casts this to a string.
